locate_destination.description: Locate a destination on the map

save_location.description: Save a located destination to a list

get_directions.description: Get directions from one location to another

add_one_more_destination.description: Add multiple destinations to a route

primitives.click the add destination icon: On the top left of the screen under the search bars, there is an icon that says 'Add Destination'. Click on it
primitives.click the directions button: In the middle left of the screen, there is a blue button that says 'Directions'. Click on it
primitives.click the save button: In the middle left of the screen and on the right of the blue button, there is a button that says 'Save'. Click on it
primitives.click the search bar: On the top left of the screen, there is a long white bar that says 'Search Google Maps'. Click on it to activate the search bar
primitives.click the share button: In the middle left of the screen and on the right of the blue button, there is a button that says 'Share'. Click on it
primitives.click the search bar of the starting poi: On the top left of the screen, there are multiple long white search bars. Click on the topmost search bar that says 'Your Location' or 'Choose starting point'
primitives.drag the destination bars: On the left of the long white search bars, there are multiple white circles. Drag the white circles to change the order of the destinations
primitives.input the destinaiton name or address: Make sure the search bar is flashing with a vertical bar. If not, click on the search bar. Then, input the destination by typing on the keyboard.
primitives.initial the search process: On the right of the search bar, there is a magnifier icon. Click on it or press enter when search bar is activated
primitives.choose the option you want from the sear: There are multiple options showing on the left of the screen, click on the one you want to select
primitives.select the travel mode that you plan to: On the top left of the screen, there are multiple icons representing different travel modes. Click on the one you want to select
primitives.select the method to share the location: In the middle of the screen, there are multiple icons for sharing methods in the new square appeared. Click on the one you want to select
